raw_answer: 解:如图,AD=8m,AB=30m,DE=3.2m；由于DE∥BC,则△ADE∽△ABC,得:\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{DE}{BC},即\frac{8}{30}=\frac{3.2}{BC},解得:BC=12m,故选:C．
